description: This file defines a configuration settings class for an application, using Pydantic's BaseSettings to load configuration from environment variables and an optional .env file. It specifies various application parameters such as server host, port, CORS settings, database URI, authentication, and URL placeholders, with validation and parsing logic.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: A Pydantic model inheriting from BaseSettings that encapsulates application configuration options loaded from environment variables and .env files.

methods.name: _parse_list_env
methods.description: A static method to parse environment variables representing lists, supporting JSON arrays, CSV strings, and lists/tuples.
